National Science Day Quiz

Welcome to the National Science Day Quiz Challenge! Test your knowledge across various technical domains and problem-solving skills.

This quiz consists of 10 challenging questions covering programming, web development, algorithms, and more.

Basic Programming - Python

1. What is the correct way to declare a list in Python?

  • a) list = (1,2,3)
  • b) list = {1,2,3}
  • c) list = [1,2,3]
  • d) list = <1,2,3>

  • a) 5
  • b) 8
  • c) 6
  • d) 9

  • b) A situation where a program crashes
  • c) A situation where two or more processes are waiting for resources indefinitely
  • d) An error in memory management
